definitions.definition: A person under discussion; a question of which person.
(interrogative) What person or people; which person or people; asks for the identity of someone. (used in a direct or indirect question)
definitions.example: I don't know who it is. (indirect question)

definitions.definition: (interrogative) What is one's position; asks whether someone deserves to say or do something.
definitions.example: I don't like what you did, but who am I to criticize you? I've done worse.
It was a nice man who helped us.
